solution_line_template: If Jane got {final_points} points and lost {points_lost} points then the total number of points she accumulated in all the rounds was {final_points}+{points_lost} = <<{final_points}+{points_lost}={total_points_accumulated}>>{total_points_accumulated} points.

If each round is awarded {points_per_round} points, then the number of rounds will be {total_points_accumulated}/{points_per_round} = <<{total_points_accumulated}/{points_per_round}={number_of_rounds}>>{number_of_rounds} rounds.
